title: Bloomberg Markets: Miller on Rally of Expectations
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Miller on Rally of Expectations
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Kevin Miller Chief Executive Officer E-Valuator Funds Discussing a positive outlook toward domestic equities while the markets wait for the administration execute on certain key expectations.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
